title: Fabián Bordagaray
text:
Fabián Bordagaray (born 15 February 1987) is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who currently plays for <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Banfield">Club Atlético Banfield</a> on loan from <a href="Defensa%20y%20Justicia">Defensa y Justicia</a> in <a href="Argentine%20Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">Argentine Primera División</a>.
Career.
Bordagaray started his career in 2006 with <a href="Defensa%20y%20Justicia">Defensa y Justicia</a> in the <a href="Primera%20B%20Nacional">Primera B Nacional</a> (Argentine second division). In 2008, he joined <a href="San%20Lorenzo%20de%20Almagro">San Lorenzo</a> of the <a href="Argentine%20Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">first division</a>, where he debuted under <a href="Diego%20Simeone">Diego Simeone</a>'s coaching.
In January 2011, the forward left San Lorenzo and was loaned from a <a href="Third-party%20ownership%20in%20association%20football">third-party</a> to <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20River%20Plate">River Plate</a>, where he signed an 18-month contract.
In January 2015, Bordagaray signed for <a href="Caracas%20FC">Caracas FC</a>.
